name: Blacksmith Simulator (itch)
description:
You are a blacksmith

you blacksmith stuff in this game.

Blacksmith in my game.

A haiku, by PlanetHoward

Tip:

Put stuff on crafting bench(brown table) to make stuff

Put iron/steel in oven to make:

SwordTop, HammerTop, SpearTop

After it's done, put in water bucket to cool down

Recipes (Put on brown table)

SwordHandle + SwordMiddle + SwordTop = Sword

Handle + HammerTop = Hammer

Handle + SpearTop = Spear

Wood Plank = Handle x2

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

E / LMB - Grab

RMB - Throw
